title: Showcasing Our Athleticism with Nintendo Switch Sports
description:
This week, we're tapping into the Old Ways of E-Bowling and Cyber-Tennis in Nintendo Switch Sports! It's like falling off a log, only the log is a sword, and we're using it to battle our children. 

Also discussed: Halo Infinite Season 2, Stanley Parable Ultra Deluxe, Knotwords
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Russ Frushtick, Chris Plante, Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy)
